headline: Ask HN: Do tech workers experience medical bankruptcy?
description:
These stats include other factors that results in this outcome. https://www.thebalance.com/medical-bankruptcy-statistics-4154729

Just wondering if tech workers have experienced bankruptcy due to illness. I read one FIRE person from Hacker News chronicling how he had to go back to work because he became ill, as his wife left him.

Medicaid is not an option for retired tech workers due to proof of property. Medicare only applies to 65+
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 科技工作者是否经历过医疗破产？
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 科技工作者是否經歷過醫療破產？
description_zh-Hans:
这些统计数字包括导致这种结果的其他因素。 https://www.thebalance.com/medical-bankruptcy-statistics-4154729

我想知道科技工作者是否有因病而破产的经历。我读到一个来自Hacker News的FIRE人士记录了他如何因为生病而不得不回去工作，因为他的妻子离开了他。

由于财产证明的问题，医疗补助不是退休技术工人的一个选择。医疗保险只适用于65岁以上的人
